title: Media enquiries

details.body:
The Driving Standards Agency (DSA) closed on 31 March 2014. It has been replaced by the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA). This is the information about DSA that was published at the point that it closed. It is no longer current.

Contact the press office

Our press office can help you to:

  • set up interviews and media events
  • make a request to film driving tests, our staff or film on our premises

Press office

Press Office
Driving Standards Agency
The Axis Building
112 Upper Parliament Street
Nottingham
NG1 6LP

Email pressoffice@dsa.gsi.gov.uk

Phone 0115 936 6135

Only for use by journalists and the media. You can reach our out-of-hours service using this number. You cannot book a driving test by phoning this number.

Resources for journalists

This information is available on GOV.UK:

  • our announcements
  • driving test and instructor statistics
  • the history of road safety, The Highway Code and the driving test

We publish images on Flickr which are free for use by press and news media. You must acknowledge DSA Crown copyright when using them.

You can follow our press office on Twitter - @DVSAPressOffice.

description: You should contact our press office if you have a media query or you’re a journalist.

available_translations.title: Media enquiries
available_translations.description: You should contact our press office if you have a media query or you’re a journalist.

withdrawn_notice.explanation: The Driving Standards Agency was replaced by the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) on 1 April 2014. You can read about making media enquiries to DVSA.
